divs: sighting detailsin my garden watching the house martins trying to nest on my next door neighbour's house. the sphere appeared in the sky in the distance and i watched it avidly, wondering what sort of bird it was. it moved in a straight line from the east (almost exactly east), over my head in an almost exact westerly direction. it's height and course was consistent with no variation on it's path at all as it travelled. i watched it until it was obscured from view. the sphere appeared to be metallic red\silver in colour and moved noiselessly. this seemed immediately odd as it passed almost directly overhead. i'm afraid i can't gauge how high it was - but not miles high, given that i thought it was a bird in the first instance... (hope that helps). it was still daylight and i had no trouble at all seeing and distinguishing the object. it was definitely spherical as opposed to any other shape. i've never seen a ufo before, and therefore would love to know what it was....
trends: There have been no other sightings in Parbold
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Red, metallic, sphere, moving in a straight line from east to west silently.
